metadata.title: CVE-2016-9812 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The gst_mpegts_section_new function in the mpegts decoder in GStreamer before 1.10.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a too small section.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.2-1ubuntu1').
